Detailed Description

template<class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
class STDPMechConfig< STDPFunction, STDPBounds >

STDPMechConfig: mechanism configurator for STDPMech.

It encapsulates the STDP parameters via STDPFunction and STDPBounds.

Member Typedef Documentation

template<class STDPFunction, class STDPBounds>
typedef STDPMech<STDPFunction, STDPBounds> STDPMechConfig< STDPFunction, STDPBounds >::related_component

Type related to this configurator type.

Used for automated construction of neurons from configurators. See NeuronFactory and SynapseFactory.
